name: review.toml

entity.name: Review
entity.description: A client review after service completion

rawContent:
# Review Entity
# Client reviews after service completion

[entity]
id = "review"
name = "Review"
description = "A client review after service completion"
table = "reviews"

[[fields]]
name = "id"
type = "string"
format = "uuid"
required = true
unique = true
description = "Unique review identifier"

[[fields]]
name = "orderId"
type = "relation"
relatedEntity = "order"
required = true
unique = true
description = "The order being reviewed"

[[fields]]
name = "rating"
type = "integer"
min = 1
max = 5
required = true
description = "Rating from 1 to 5 stars"

[[fields]]
name = "comment"
type = "text"
required = false
description = "Optional review comment"

[[fields]]
name = "createdAt"
type = "datetime"
required = true
description = "Review submission timestamp"

[relations]
order = { entity = "order", type = "one-to-one", field = "orderId" }

[implementation]
interface = "ReviewEntity"
file = "src/prototype/factories/index.ts"
mock = "src/prototype/mocks/reviews.json"
status = "planned"
